briefTitle: Denosumab for Prevention of Osteoporosis in Renal Transplant Recipients

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
The key inclusion criteria are:

1. Male or female adult de novo kidney, kidney-pancreas or kidney-islet, or kidney-liver transplant recipients
2. Functioning graft within 28 days after transplantation (creatinine having decreased to \<200 micromol/l without the need for dialysis)
3. Being on standard triple immunosuppression including a calcineurin antagonist (cyclosporine or tacrolimus), mycophenolate (MMF or MPA) and steroids, with or without induction treatment with basiliximab or anti-thymocyte globulin

Key exclusion criteria are:

1. Age \<18 years
2. Rising creatinine after initial drop \<200 micromol/l or creatinine \>200 micromol/l at baseline
3. Evidence of early acute rejection, either suspected clinically and/or proven by biopsy
4. Presence of severe osteoporosis as evidenced by a T score \<-4 at the hip, femoral neck or any of the 4 vertebrae L1 to L4
5. Evidence of severe hyper- or hypoparathyroidism (iPTH \>800 ng/l or \<10 ng/l)
6. Hypocalcemia (total calcium \<1.8 mmol/l) or hypercalcemia (total calcium \>2.7 mmol/l)
7. Steroid-free de novo immunosuppression scheme

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in BMD at the Total Lumbar Spine From Baseline to Month 12
outcomeMeasures.description: The total lumbar spine BMD was measured via Dual Energy X-ray Absorptiometry (DXA) and was expressed in g/cm2 hydroxylapatite

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in BMD at the Total Hip From Baseline to Month 12
outcomeMeasures.description: The total hip BMD was measured via Dual Energy X-ray Absorptiometry (DXA) and was expressed in g/cm2 hydroxylapatite

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in BMD at the Femoral Neck From Baseline to Month 12
outcomeMeasures.description: The total femoral neck BMD was measured via Dual Energy X-ray Absorptiometry (DXA) and was expressed in g/cm2 hydroxylapatite

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in BMD at the Total Lumbar Spine From Baseline to Month 6
outcomeMeasures.description: The total lumbar spine BMD was measured via DXA and was expressed in g/cm2 hydroxylapatite.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in BMD at the Total Hip From Baseline to Month 6
outcomeMeasures.description: The total hip BMD was measured via DXA and was expressed in g/cm2 hydroxylapatite

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in BMD at the Femoral Neck From Baseline to Month 6
outcomeMeasures.description: The femoral neck BMD was measured via DXA and was expressed in g/cm2 hydroxylapatite

outcomeMeasures.title: Beta-CTX at Baseline and Months 3, 6 and 12
outcomeMeasures.description: Blood concentrations of beta-CTX (microgram/L)

outcomeMeasures.title: P1NP at Baseline and Months 3, 6 and 12
outcomeMeasures.description: Blood concentrations of P1NP were measured in microgram/L

outcomeMeasures.title: Blood Levels of Calcium (mmol/L) at Baseline and Months 0.5, 1, 2, 3, 6, 12
outcomeMeasures.description: Blood levels of calcium (mmol/L) were measured at baseline and at months 0.5, 1, 2, 3, 6, and 12

outcomeMeasures.title: Blood Levels of Phosphate (mmol/L) at Baseline and Months 0.5, 1, 2, 3, 6, 12
outcomeMeasures.description: Blood levels of phosphate (mmol/L) were measured at baseline and at months 0.5, 1, 2, 3, 6, 12

outcomeMeasures.title: Blood Levels of PTH (ng/L) at Baseline and Months 3, 6, and 12
outcomeMeasures.description: Blood levels of PTH (ng/L) were measured at baseline and at months 3, 6, and 12

outcomeMeasures.title: 25-OH-vitamin D3
outcomeMeasures.description: Blood levels of 25-OH-vitamin D3 were measured as microgramm/L

outcomeMeasures.title: 1,25-(OH)2 Vitamin D3
outcomeMeasures.description: Blood levels of 1,25-(OH)2 vitamin D3 were measured as ng/L

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline in Total Volumetric Bone Mineral Densitiy (Tot.vBMD) at the Distal Tibia
outcomeMeasures.description: Volumetric BMD (vBMD) was measured via HR-pQCT (Xtreme CT) at the distal tibia and was expressed as mg HA/cm3.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline in Cortical Volumetric Bone Mineral Densitiy (Ct.vBMD) at the Distal Tibia
outcomeMeasures.description: Volumetric BMD (vBMD) was measured via HR-pQCT (Xtreme CT) at the distal tibia and was expressed as mg HA/cm3.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline in Trabecular Volumetric Bone Mineral Densitiy (Tb.vBMD) at the Distal Tibia
outcomeMeasures.description: Volumetric BMD (vBMD) was measured via HR-pQCT (Xtreme CT) at the distal tibia and was expressed as mg HA/cm3.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline in Cortical Thickness (Ct.Th) at the Distal Tibia
outcomeMeasures.description: Cortical thickness was measured via HR-pQCT (Xtreme CT) at the distal tibia and was expressed as mm.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline in Total Volumetric Bone Mineral Densitiy (Tot.vBMD) at the Distal Radius
outcomeMeasures.description: Volumetric BMD (vBMD) was measured via HR-pQCT (Xtreme CT) at the distal radius and was expressed as mg HA/cm3.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline in Cortical Volumetric Bone Mineral Densitiy (Ct.vBMD) at the Distal Radius
outcomeMeasures.description: Volumetric BMD (vBMD) was measured via HR-pQCT (Xtreme CT) at the distal radius and was expressed as mg HA/cm3.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline in Trabecular Volumetric Bone Mineral Densitiy (Tb.vBMD) at the Distal Radius
outcomeMeasures.description: Volumetric BMD (vBMD) was measured via HR-pQCT (Xtreme CT) at the distal radius and was expressed as mg HA/cm3.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline in Cortical Thickness (Ct.Th) at the Distal Radius
outcomeMeasures.description: Cortical thickness was measured via HR-pQCT (Xtreme CT) at the distal radius and was expressed as mm.
